mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id AS t1Id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.promise, t1.huankuankDate, t1.tsc,
map.principal , map.interest , map.fee,
t2.id AS t2Id, t2.fukuanId , t2.hsId , t2.amount, t2.jiekuanDate, t2.capitalId , t2.useInterest, t2.useDays
FROM hs_same_huankuan t1 LEFT JOIN hs_same_huankuan_map map ON t1.id = map.huankuanId LEFT JOIN hs_same_jiekuan t2 ON map.jiekuanId = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t1.deleted = 0

select t1.id, t1.orderId, t1.hsId, t1.promise, t1.huankuankDate, t1.tsc from hs_same_huankuan t1
AND t1.deleted = 0 AND t1.orderId=#{orderId} AND t1.hsId=#{hsId} AND t1.huankuanDate=#{huankuanDate}
